attributes.action: Enact legislation to make it illegal for UK Legal Aid Funding to be used to pay off Bavarian State Courts in return for a declaration of innocence.
attributes.additional_details: The Bernie Ecclestone outcome demonstrates how morally corrupt the EU system of justice is.  If a judge in a member state can be used to buy off a criminal charge from another country then the taxpayer pounds taken and put in the UK Legal Aid Fund in this country MUST be protected against being taken and used for that purpose in other member states of the EU.  This is the very least that taxpayers of this country deserve.
